magazine.description: Blue Mind Magazine is where surf and science meet. We explore the fascinating intersection of ocean sports, human health, and scientific research.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between scientific research and the surfing community, making complex studies accessible and actionable.

editor.title: Chief Editor
editor.name: Pedro Seixas
editor.bio: Pedro Seixas holds a PhD in Human Kinetics and serves as the Scientific Coordinator at Surfing Medicine International (SMI). As a physiotherapist and passionate surfer, he founded Blue Mind Magazine to create a platform that unites his two greatest passions: science and surfing.

publisher.title: Publisher

publisher.description: Surfisio is a specialized physiotherapy and sports performance company dedicated to the surfing community. Founded in 2011 with the philosophy "We Drop The Pain!"

smi.name: Surfing Medicine International
smi.description: SMI is a non-profit organization founded by medical doctors and surfers dedicated to the science of surfing medicine.
